data.title: Ohio University
data.meta_description: Ohio University has numerous talented alumni authors. This collection is to serve as a resource to support these Bobcats and their work. Add some Green and White to your TBR list!Use the search bar below to search by genre or keywords.Genres: Biographies/Memoirs, Romance, Business, Children, Computers/Technology, Education, Fiction, Health/Medicine, History, Music, Poetry, Politics/Government, Religion, Social Sciences, Science/Math, Sports, Engineering, Cookbooks, Graphic Novel, Science Fiction, Travel, Cinema, Self-Help, Non-Fiction, Other
